title: Codieal Social Web App
description: Built and deployed a social media platform with Express.js, Node.js, and MongoDB, boosting engagement by 30%, reducing onboarding time by 25%, and supporting 10,000+ daily users.

title: Movie App
description: Developed a dynamic movie app with React and Redux, attracting 2,000+ users, processing 15,000+ API calls monthly, and boosting user engagement by 25% through features like favorites and a responsive search bar.

title: Weather App
description: Developed a dynamic weather app with React.js, attracting 5,000+ users, processing 10,000+ daily API requests, and improving performance by 20% while ensuring cross-device compatibility.
